name: SupportInnesAndDoggo
_source: speak;Innes;So you're the Hellhound everyone's been talking about.
speak;Innes;I'll admit, I was skeptical.|A demonic beast fighting alongside us?|It seemed...unlikely.
speak;Innes;However, I've observed your performance in battle.|Your tactical positioning is...adequate.
speak;Innes;Don't misunderstand me.|I'm not impressed easily.|But you seem to comprehend battlefield strategy better than most soldiers.
speak;Innes;Yes, well...|I suppose even a Hellhound can be trained properly.|The question is, who trained you?
speak;Innes;I've been practicing my archery.|Would you care to observe?|I could use a...competent spotter.
speak;Innes;Very well.|Watch carefully.|This is how a true marksman operates.
speak;Innes;Your enthusiasm is...noted.|Perhaps you have better judgment than I initially assumed.
speak;Innes;What is it now?|I'm attempting to concentrate.
speak;Innes;You want me to follow you?|This had better be important.
speak;Innes;Where exactly are you leading me?
speak;Innes;Bandits.|A large group, by the looks of it.|And they're heading toward our camp.
speak;Innes;You discovered this and came to warn me?|That's...surprisingly perceptive.
speak;Innes;We need to alert the others immediately.|But first...
speak;Innes;Yes, I know you're eager for battle.|Your bloodlust is quite apparent.
speak;Innes;However, we must be strategic.|A frontal assault would be foolish, even for us.
speak;Innes;We'll set up an ambush.|You can flush them toward my position.|Think you can handle that?
speak;Innes;Good.|Your tracking abilities are proving...useful.|I may have underestimated your worth as an ally.
speak;Innes;Don't let it go to your head.|I simply recognize competence when I see it.
speak;Innes;That ambush was executed flawlessly.|Your performance was...exemplary.
speak;Innes;I've been thinking about our partnership.|You're not like other beasts I've encountered.
speak;Innes;There's an intelligence behind your actions.|A calculating mind that rivals seasoned tacticians.
speak;Innes;I'll be honest with you.|When we first met, I saw you as nothing more than a weapon.|A dangerous tool to be pointed at our enemies.
speak;Innes;But you've proven yourself to be much more than that.|You're a soldier.|A comrade.|And...dare I say it...a friend.
speak;Innes;Don't make a big deal of it.|I simply recognize quality when I see it.
speak;Innes;You know, back in Frelia, we have legends about Hellhounds.|Fearsome beasts that serve only darkness and destruction.
speak;Innes;Those legends are clearly exaggerated.|You've shown more honor than many humans I've known.
speak;Innes;When this war ends, you'd be welcome in Frelia.|I could use someone with your...unique talents in my service.
speak;Innes;Think about it.|A prince and his Hellhound companion.|We'd be quite the formidable team.
speak;Innes;I'll take that as a yes.|Welcome to my inner circle, my friend.
